name: Plumbum iodatum
details: Has been used empirically in various forms of paralysis, sclerotic degenerations, especially of spinal cord, atrophies, arteriosclerosis, pellagra. INDURATIONS OF MAMMARY GLANDS, ESPECIALLY WHEN A TENDENCY TO BECOME INFLAMED APPEARS; SORE AND PAINFUL. Indurations of great hardness and associated with a very dry skin. Lancinating pains of TABES.
